title: Ep 317: Bobby's 80 Billboards

description:
Bobby is the Michelin Man. Khalyla sees the green flash of light. Gilbert is Gilbird. We talk Bobo's birthday party, billionaire purchases, future bathrooms, fiddler fathers, and play the thing is is that squid game.
